content: toddler rolled brim winter cap & matching scarf © crystal s mcdonald the hippie diva toddler rolled brim winter cap jiffy thick & quick size n hook chain chain 4 join with slip_stitch slip_stitch to create a circle 1 -- chain 3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet now and throughout 11 double_crochet in circle join in space space between first and second double_crochet 12 double_crochet 2 -- chain 3 turn double_crochet in same space as joining 2 double_crochet in each space around join as before 24 double_crochet 3 -- chain 3 turn double_crochet in same space as joining * double_crochet in next space 2 double_crochet in next space repeat from * around join 36 double_crochet 4 to 11 -- chain 3 turn double_crochet in each space around join finish off weave in ends toddler scarf jiffy thick & quick size n hook chain chain 9 double_crochet double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and each chain across 7 double_crochet chain 3 turn double_crochet in each stitch across including top of previous row s chain-3 7 double_crochet repeat until scarf measures as long as you want it finish off weave in ends all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only do not sell this pattern or items made from this pattern no part of this pattern may be reproduced adapted translated stored in a retrieval system or transmitted in any form or by any means without the prior written permission of crystal s mcdonald july 2008 visit hippie diva creations today http //www hippiediva com/
